771f8a68-df05-4d9c-8e4a-10b03bd5f224.content: Both stocks and bonds have their own advantages and disadvantages. Stocks generally offer higher potential returns but also come with greater risk, while bonds can provide a more stable source of income but with lower potential returns. The decision ultimately depends on your investment goals, time horizon, and risk tolerance. I would recommend discussing your specific situation with me in more detail so we can determine the best course of action together.
